verbs.description: bedunce (third-person singular simple present bedunces, present participle beduncing, simple past and past participle bedunced)

entries.meaning: (transitive, archaic, rare) To treat as, or reduce to, a dunce; to make stupid.
examples: After he has sufficiently bedunced us through several pages, he at last has the tenderness to answer to our particular objections, and that with sufficient perplexity.
